name: Metabit Network
description: Metabit is a large-scale commercial high-performance blockchain platform. The concept of the Metabit Network is to be application-oriented and serve the ecology. It focuses on developing general commercial applications and forming an ecology based on providing a strong, secure, autonomous blockchain operation network. Based on this concept, the MetaBit network integrates EVM, provides the development capability of the Metabit App, and implements any Metabit System based on the App to correspond to various commercial systems.
